product_name: CliniquePink Honey Affair All About Shadow Palette
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique's Pink Honey Affair All About Shadow Palette is perfect for day...amped up for night when you layer multiple shades for extra depth and dimension. Long-wearing shades are crease- and fade-resistant. Ophthalmologist tested, too.
details: DetailsBenefitsLong-wearing shades are crease- and fade-resistant.Resistant and encased in a deluxe-sized, mirrored compact with a dual-ended sponge applicator.Safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.No parabens. No phthalates. Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.Item 2615261How To UseUse brush-tip side of applicator to sweep one shade across entire lid, lash line to brow bone.Use sponge-tip side for a more intense application. Layer and blend color into the crease and/or along lash lines.For a more detailed application, choose specialists from Clinique's Makeup BrushCollection.Remove with your favorite Clinique makeup remover.IngredientsPlease be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use brush-tip side of applicator to sweep one shade across entire lid, lash line to brow bone.Use sponge-tip side for a more intense application. Layer and blend color into the crease and/or along lash lines.For a more detailed application, choose specialists from Clinique's Makeup BrushCollection.Remove with your favorite Clinique makeup remover.
ingredients: Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Definitely a Keeper
reviews.comments: This palette is absolutely beautiful!!

reviews.headline: The one I've been waiting for!
reviews.comments:
This eyeshadow collection is perfect! Great highlighter and base colors, fantastic contouring colors too!
I will be reordering again and again and again. Color lasts throughout the day but easy to remove. A Nude Honey Mood is a value because every color will be used.

reviews.headline: Pretty shades
reviews.comments: I like this pallet but I have several others with very similar shades. I'm not sure I'd purchase again.

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy again!
reviews.comments: Beautiful color story. Smooth application. Blends well

reviews.headline: Beautiful for every day
reviews.comments: This product glides on easy and has a soft glow.  It wears well throughout the day and doesn't smudge or cake in the creases of my eye.

reviews.headline: No brush!
reviews.comments: So annoyed that the picture shows a brush on one end and there isn't one!

reviews.headline: Not pigmented
reviews.comments: I loved the way these colors looked in the pan but unfortunately they are just not pigmented enough. The pink colors do not show up on the skin and only leave a satin-like finish. I really like this color palette and hope Clinique will work to improve this but until then I won't be repurchasing.

reviews.headline: Not pigmented or true to pan
reviews.comments: I love all things Black Honey and wanted something hypoallergenic, so I was excited to try this. I was disappointed. A few of the shades have a nice satin finish, but for the most part they are not buildable, are very hard pressed and difficult to put on a brush or sponge, some shades are almost dupes of one another, go ashy when applied, and colors are not true to pan (are much more sheer). I depotted the pans and kept about half of them.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I've been eyeing this palette for awhile. The color story is perfect for every day use, sleek packaging is perfect for travel. Ulta staff told me palette includes a 2 sided brush. I was disappointed that it was not a brush but a sponge tip applicator. The shadows are very lightly pigmented. I used two different eyeshadow primers but neither helped. An allergic reaction sealed the deal. Unfortunately, I will be returning this.

reviews.headline: Glides on smoothly! Beautiful colors!!
reviews.comments: Colors are highly pigmented and glide on smoothly. Bendable and wearable!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Love the colors!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again in a different color
reviews.comments: Colors are great; appreciate some of the colors are matte.   I don't think it stays on all day without creasing, unless I am using the primer cream with it.

reviews.headline: New item for me
reviews.comments:
I wanted a duo eyeshadow but my Ulta did not have any to buy. 
I saw this palette and I like the color selection. 
So far I only used a couple of the colors. 
Most likely I won't use them all. 
Since my Ulta doesn't have the selection they used to.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again and again
reviews.comments:
I love the colors
I like how the line up that you can create different looks from Left to Right and the added bonus the compact can be used as a mirror 
Most of all I love Black Honey Collection 
Next I will try the Pink Honey Collection 
Keep it coming

reviews.headline: Absolutely the best!!
reviews.comments: My cosmetic drawer was a mess.  I must have had 14 eye shadows all swimming around in there.  THEN along comes Clinique with ALL OF THEM in one group called "Pink Honey Affair".  I've never been so happy!  And you should see my make-up drawer!!

reviews.headline: I am in love with Clinique best of black honey
reviews.comments: I absolutely love the Clinique best of black honey eye shadow collection. All the colors are beautiful.

reviews.headline: A little underwhelmed for cost
reviews.comments: Clinique is a good brand for sure but the pallette is very smal for cost and even with building it up it is not a very noticeable product

reviews.headline: I would totally buy this again!
reviews.comments: This is a Beautiful pallet, all of the colors are so pretty and work well together. They're not too shiny and go in very smoothly.

reviews.headline: Product Not for Me
reviews.comments: I told the sales clerk that I wanted eye shadow that was matte, not shiny.  Unfortunately, even the shades that indicated they were matte were not what I consider to be matte.  Will have to return and find something else.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: The colors are really pretty but the pigment is nonexistent. No matter how many layers I added it just didn't show. I've recently been disappointed with Clinique decline in quality

faceoff_positive.comments:
Versatility and Range: The Clinique Black Honey eyeshadow palette offers an exquisite array of eight shades, ranging from subtle, natural tones to bold, smoky hues. Perfect for both day and night looks, this palette is a versatile must-have for any makeup enthusiast.

Pigmentation and Blendability: Each shadow in the palette boasts impressive pigmentation, ensuring vibrant color payoff with minimal effort. The finely-milled powders blend seamlessly, allowing for a smooth application that can be built up for intensity or sheered out for a more natural finish.

Longevity: Clinique's renowned formula provides long-lasting wear that resists creasing and fading throughout the day. Whether it's a busy workday or a night out, these shadows stay put, maintaining their beauty for hours on end.

Packaging and Presentation: Housed in a sleek, portable compact, the palette is as stylish as it is practical. The included mirror and applicator make it easy to create your perfect look on the go.

Skin-Friendly Ingredients: True to Clinique's commitment to skin health, the Black Honey palette is ophthalmologist-tested and safe for sensitive eyes. The shadows are free of parabens, phthalates, and fragrance, making them a great choice for those with delicate skin.

Overall Impression: Clinique's Best of Black Honey All About Shadow Palette is a triumph in eyeshadow formulation. With its superb color range, blendable textures, and long-wearing formula, it earns a well-deserved 5 stars. This palette is not just makeup; it's an essential tool for self-expression and beauty.
faceoff_positive.headline: A 5-Star Experience

faceoff_negative.comments: The colors are pretty, but this comes with an applicator with a sponge on both ends.  The applicator with the brush on one end and the sponge on the other does not exist.  That was the only reason I purchased this product, and I was very disappointed.  I tried to resolve the issue using live chat and spent an hour and forty minutes texting three different people to only find out that the website is wrong.  To Clinique's credit, they did give me a refund, but only after an additional thirty-minute phone call for a grand total of two hours of my time. For this reason only I went with 2 stars instead of 1.  This is definitely not worth the money without the applicator shown and described here on this website.  It is false advertisement.  If you purchase this set, please know that you will not get an eyeshadow brush.  BRING BACK THE BRUSH CLINIQUE.  I am not the only one with this issue.
faceoff_negative.headline: This does not come with a brush applicator

rollup.name: Pink Honey Affair All About Shadow Palette
